title: Strange Interaction
body: So i was playing a game earlier today as Blitzcrank, and on our team we also had an Ahri. we were looking to hook an unknowing target but he was slightly out of range, so Ahri charmed him and then i hooked, but my hook didnt pull the enemy to us, is this an intended interaction or some kind of bug?

replies.body: it certainly wasnt camera angles, it was a 2v1, the enemy was alone and we all saw it and were confused, but i may try to get some people together to do some testing, Thanks :)

Usually in such an interaction, whichever displacement hits last takes precedence (e.g you can knock Trist out of the middle of her jump if you can manage to hit her, but Ez can E in the middle of a blitz hook) with a few exceptions like Warwicks ult (he cannot be disabled while he is travelling).

In your case, You would think that the Blitz hook would take priority, but in truth I don't really know how Ahri's charm is meant to interact with abilities like that.

My recommendation would be to jump into a custom with a friend and test the interaction, see if it is reproducible, maybe even test it with other similar abilities (Trist Ult, Thresh Hook, Darius Pull etc etc). It might have only been a matter of timing, or camera angles, or things being too hectic to see what happened exactly.
